objectives_summary: You will learn about the 6 pillars of Entrepreneur Success and the building blocks that form those pillars. At the end of this course, you will know how to adjust or improve your approach to success so that you can thrive as an business owner and entrepreneur.
At the end of this course, you will know how to adjust or improve your approach to success so that you can thrive as an business owner and entrepreneur.

items.title: Answer "So, What Do You Do?" In a Way that Actually Works

visible_instructors.title: Will Dukes
visible_instructors.job_title: Sales Farmer: I Grow Businesses and Prevent Wasted Marketing
visible_instructors.name: Will

items.headline: Deliver Intriguing Introductions that Open Opportunities through Networking Events and Online Channels
objectives_summary: Confidently answer, "So, what do you do" in a way that generates interest and more conversation
Cut through the "noise," and create introductions that make you stand out and be memorable
Use frameworks for creating Short (<5 seconds), Medium (15-30 seconds), and Long Introductions (30-60 seconds, aka the "Elevator Pitch")
